Sentencas: Gas diffusion within supporting cathodes of solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) plays an important role in CO2 electrolysis process.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: This study has investigated the effect of cathode pore structure on gas diffusion during CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The cathode pore structure was adjusted by applying the different amounts of pore former during cathode preparation.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The more pore former added produced the higher porosity of cathode and the higher limiting current density.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: High limiting current densities are beneficial to diminish or even eliminate gas diffusion limitation in practical applications, where the electrolysis is expected to be operated at low CO2 concentrations to increase CO2 conversion.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: An advanced impedance spectroscopy study is performed to confirm the limiting current density measured according to current-voltage curves.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: It was revealed that CO2 electrolysis performance is greatly affected by gas diffusion, which is determined by the employed cathode pore structure.
Titulo: Effect of NiO/YSZ cathode support pore structure on CO2 electrolysis via solid oxide electrolysis cells
